card.title: Welcome
card.text: Welcome to join my adventure. To learn how to use this skill, say "Help".

voice.intro: Welcome to join our adventure. To learn how to play, say "Help".
voice.prompt: if you want to play a teddy bear adventure game, say teddy bear. If you want to take a quiz about space, say space quiz. If you want to try a little personality test on star wars, say star wars.

card.title: Welcome
card.text: Hi, I am your personal AI assistant. You are a little kid who was just chosen to be a Jedi Apprentice in the Jedi Temple. The first task for you is to listen to The Force, and tell me which Jedi master you want to follow.

voice.intro: Hi, I am your personal AI assistant. You are a little kid who was just chosen to be a Jedi Apprentice in the Jedi Temple. The first task for you is to listen to The Force, and tell me which Jedi master you want to follow. Tell me "Master Yoda" or "Master Anakin".

card.title: Jedi Observatory
card.prompt: You followed Master Yoda into the Jedi Observatory. Here, he wants you to choose a lightsaber you like.

voice.intro: You followed Master Yoda into the Jedi Observatory. Here, he wants you to choose a lightsaber you like.

card.title: President Office
card.prompt: You followed Master Yoda into the Senator Office. Here, he wants you to choose a lightsaber you like.

voice.intro: You followed Master Anakin into the Senator Office. Here, he wants you to choose a lightsaber you like. Tips: there is a hidden option for this question. Thank, what is the opposite word for long?
voice.prompt: You can say long lightsaver, or you can say the hidden option.

voice.intro: You chose a heavy lightsaber. Your lightsaber is made of gold. You must have a heart of gold. Never lose faith in yourself. Good luck!
voice.prompt: Say "Exit" to exit the game. Say "reset" to choose another the game.

voice.intro: You chose a light lightsaber. You are a happy little child. Master Yoda says to you, "I wish you all the success today and always!"
voice.prompt: Say "Exit" to exit the game. Say "reset" to choose another the game.

voice.intro: You chose a long lightsaber. You are a visionary child. Let good luck be on your side always!
voice.prompt: Say "Exit" to exit the game. Say "reset" to choose another the game.

voice.intro:
Congratulations! You found the hidden option. You chose a short lightsaber. You always care for others. May your troubles be less
and your blessings be more.
voice.prompt: Say "Exit" to exit the game. Say "reset" to choose another the game.

voice.intro: Hello, welcome to the space quiz! We have 7 questions prepared for you. Once you get the question right, you can proceed to the next one. If you get the question wrong, you can say again, to answer this question again. And you get the chance to continue answering questions. You can choose another game  by saying restart.
voice.prompt: Ready for the quiz? Say start. or if you want to choose another game, say 'restart'.

voice.intro: Which is the largest planet in our solar system?
voice.prompt: Is it Jupiter or Mars?

voice.intro: Correct!
voice.prompt: Say next to next question.

voice.intro: The answer is wrong. Jupiter is the largest planet in our solar system.
voice.prompt: You can say again for another chance, or say exit to quit the game.

card.title: Intro
card.text: Welcome to your adventure as a teddy bear. Tomorrow is the big Teddy Bear party, and you must definitely not let your owner forget about it... Would you like to help remind your owner David?

voice.intro: Welcome to your adventure as a teddy bear. Tomorrow is the big Teddy Bear party, and you must definitely not let your owner forget about it... Would you like to help your owner david.
voice.prompt: Say yes if you wish to help or say reset to choose another game.

card.title: Bedroom
card.text: David, your owner, lies next to you on the bed, in a deep sleep.

voice.intro: David, your owner, lies next to you on the bed, in a deep sleep. He seems to be having a nightmare.
voice.prompt: Say 'hug' to hug david and help fight monsters in his dream.

voice.intro: David remains sound asleep. You know that David is super forgetful, and he definitely forgets to send out invitations. You want to find his laptop, and send invitations out to everyone. First you have to get off the bed.
voice.prompt: Say get off the bed

voice.intro: You tumble down, but being a soft bear, that's ok. It feels a little bit chilly in the room. So you want to wear your thick jacket to keep warm.
voice.prompt: Say run to cabinet to get your jacket.

voice.intro:
Your warm winter jacket is here. The jacket has big
pockets to help you carry things. It's a long way to David's laptop, and you thought it's a good idea to ride David's cat Chester. Plus, chester knows where the laptop is, since she always sleeps on it. Her favorite treats and toys are here in the cabinet too. Maybe you can use these when you see her. Which one would you carry with you?
voice.prompt: Say cat treats or rattled ball.

voice.intro: You take the rattled ball with you. Since your hand is really furry, so the ball slips off your hand, and rolls out of the bedroom. Now go chase it, bear!
voice.prompt: Say run to chase for the ball.

voice.intro: You take the her treats with you. You walks out of the bedroom to the living room. Chester is asleep on the couch. You climbed on the couch. Now you want to wake her up. Would you pat her, or scare her to wake her up.
voice.prompt: You can say pat her or scare her.

voice.intro: You ran to the hallway. Chester is right here, holding the ball in her paw. You asks chester nicely, "Can you take me to david's laptop?". Chester says,  "sure. But you have to help me figure out how many toys I have. I have 2 mouse, 2 boxes and 3 balls. In total, do I have 6 or 7 toys?
voice.prompt: Tell chester how many.

voice.intro: There's a good bear. Chester wakes up gently. Luckily you can communicate with cat too. So You asks chester nicely, "Can you take me to david's laptop? I will give you the treats". She agrees and you climbed onto her back.
voice.prompt: Say Thank you Chester.

voice.intro: Chester bites you on the arm. Good thing you are a fluffy teddy bear and can't feel pain. You apologize to chester and gives her the treats.
voice.prompt: Say sorry chester

voice.intro: Chester carries you on her back and takes you to the study . David's laptop is right there on the desk. You want to enter his email, but you don't know his password. Chester says, "I know the password. But you have to tell me, which is the biggest number among 12, 7, 14?"
voice.prompt: Say the right answer to chester

voice.intro: Chester says, "you're right!" She types in the password for you. David is such a forgetful boy, you thought. He has the invitations written, but never sent it! Do you want to know what he wrote on the invitation?
voice.prompt: Say read me the invitation to find out.

voice.intro: Chester says, "wrong answer. Let's try again. What is the biggest number among 12, 14, 7"
voice.prompt: Say the answer to chester

voice.intro: Chester says, "wrong answer. Let's try again. What is the biggest number among 12, 14, 7"
voice.prompt: Say the answer to chester

voice.intro: Chester says, "you're right!" She types in the password for you. David is such a forgetful boy, you thought. He has the invitations written, but never sent it! Do you want to know what he wrote on the invitation?
voice.prompt: Say read me the invitation to find out.

voice.intro: Chester says, "wrong answer." And she tells you 14 is the largest among 12. 14. 7
voice.prompt: Say 14 to chester

voice.intro: Chester says, "you're right!" She types in the password for you. David is such a forgetful boy, you thought. He has the invitations written, but never sent it! Do you want to know what he wrote on the invitation?
voice.prompt: Say read me the invitation to find out.

voice.intro: Chester says, "wrong answer." And she tells you 14 is the largest among 12. 14. 7
voice.prompt: Say 14 to chester

voice.intro: Teddy bear party today! Everyone who is young, or just young at heart, will have a fine day out at the Teddy Bear Picnic. Bring along your teddy bear and partake in all the fun! Frolic in the woods, join the scavenger hunt, and you never know, a special guest may just turn up! Now only thing you need to do is to send this email out!
voice.prompt: Say Send to send this email to everyone you know!

voice.intro: Sent! Now this email is in everyone's mailbox, and everyone will see it tomorrow morning. "But would david forget about this?" You're getting a little worried. "I can print it, and put it on david's nightstand." Now you need to tell his laptop to print.
voice.prompt: Say print the flyer

voice.intro: Sent! Now this email is in everyone's mailbox, and everyone will see it tomorrow morning. "But would david forget about this?" You're getting a little worried. "I can print it, and put it on david's nightstand." Now you need to tell his laptop to print.
voice.prompt: Say print the flyer

voice.intro: Sent! Now this email is in everyone's mailbox, and everyone will see it tomorrow morning. "But would david forget about this?" You're getting a little worried. "I can print it, and put it on david's nightstand." Now you need to tell his laptop to print.
voice.prompt: Say print the flyer

voice.intro: But I actually have 7 toys. You see, 2 plus 2 plus 3, is 7. But I will carry you to david's laptop anyways.
voice.prompt: Now say Thank you chester

voice.intro: Chester says, "correct! Now, Let's go to David's laptop."
voice.prompt: Now say thank you chester.

David is such a forgetful boy, you thought. He has the invitations written, but never sent it! Do you want to know what he wrote on the invitation?
voice.prompt: Say read me the invitation to find out.

voice.intro: Who was the first human being landing on Moon?
voice.prompt: Is it Armstrong or Aldrin?

voice.intro: Correct!
voice.prompt: Say next to next question.

voice.intro: Actually, Edwin Aldrin was the second human who put step on the Moon.
voice.prompt: You can say again for another chance, or say exit to quit the game.

voice.intro: How many planets are there in our Solar System?
voice.prompt: Is it 8 or 9.

voice.intro: Congratulations! Your answer is correct!
voice.prompt: Say next to next question.

voice.intro: The right answer is 8. Actually there was 9 planets in our Solar System before 2006. But Pluto was reclassified as a dwarf planet after 2006.
voice.prompt: You can say again for another chance, or say exit to quit the game.

voice.intro: Which planet is approximately the same landmass as the Earth.
voice.prompt: Is it Jupiter or Mars?

voice.intro: Congratulations! this is the right answer!
voice.prompt: Say 'Next' to the next question.

voice.intro: The right answer is Mars. Actually, Jupiter is much much much much bigger than the Earth.
voice.prompt: You can say again for another chance, or say exit to quit the game.

voice.intro: Who was the first person to reach space?
voice.prompt: Is it "Yuri Gagarin" , or "Neil Armstrong"?

voice.intro: Congratulations! This is the right answer!
voice.prompt: Say next to move to the next question.

voice.intro: Sorry, this is the wrong answer. Neil Armstrong was the first man who landed on the Moon.
voice.prompt: You can say again for another chance, or say exit to quit the game.

voice.intro: Have human beings ever set foot on Mars?
voice.prompt: Yes or no?

voice.intro: Congratulation! This is the right answer.
voice.prompt: Say next to the next question.

voice.intro: Sorry. Even though I really wish we had set foot on Mars, we haven't yet.
voice.prompt: You can say again for another chance, or say exit to quit the game.

voice.intro: This is the last question. What is a supernova?
voice.prompt: Is it a superstar or an explosion?

voice.intro: Sorry, this is the wrong answer.
voice.prompt: You can say again for another chance, or say exit to quit the game.

voice.intro: Congratulations! You are correct. A supernova is n explosion that marks the death of a huge star.
voice.prompt: You have reached the end of this challenge. You are so clever. Say 'stop' to stop the game. Say 'restart' to choose another game.
